        private java.lang.String getResourceType(java.lang.String resourceID)
                                  throws java.sql.SQLException

        resourceID - ID of a resource
        Returns:
        the resource type as a string (matches a database table)

              throws java.sql.SQLException

        Parameters:

      • searchResources

        public java.util.ArrayList<Resource> searchResources(java.lang.String searchTerm,
                                                     java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> tables)
                                              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Searches the database for Resource
        Parameters:
        searchTerm - a keyword to be searched by e.g. ID, Title, and year
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Resources (which can be cast into their actual types)
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if connection to the database fails
